description.narrative: UNEP DTU Partnership is delivering into UN Environment's Medium Term Strategy (MTS) 2018-2021 and the underlying Biannual Programme of work (PoW). The MTS has the overall vision that "by 2030 countries are more resilient to the adverse impacts of climate change and greenhouse gas emissions are significantly reduced". The MTS underlines governments' need to adopt strategies to reduce their emissions and increase their investments in renewable energy and energy efficiency. Based on the UNFCCC decisions including the Paris Agreement, the UN Environment MTS will support the achievement of the SDGs 7, 13 and 15 (biodiversity). UN Environment will work in partnership to achieve these goals and will strengthen and expand public & private partnerships, continue to engage with non-state actors and promote deployment and transfer of technology.
